name: Chicken Burgers with Mango and Blueberry Salsa
description: Jam-packed with antioxidant-rich blueberries and mangos!

ingredients.name: diced fresh mango or frozen mango

preparation: Combine chicken, egg whites, and dip mixes in a mixing bowl.
With water-moistened hands, form mixture into 4 patties.
Cook burgers in a grill pan over medium heat for 5 minutes per side or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a food-safe internal temperature of 165º F (74º C).
Combine mango, blueberries and reserved Poco Picante Mix in a small mixing bowl. Set aside.
Place burgers on buns. Top with lettuce and prepared salsa and serve immediately.
tips: Serve with a mixed green salad and your favourite prepared Epicure Dressing.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
